Plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption and murder.
Title: Chinatown
Actors: Jack Nicholson, Faye Dunaway, John Huston, Perry Lopez
tomatoConsensus: As bruised and cynical as the decade that produced it, this noir classic benefits from Robert Towne's brilliant screenplay, director Roman Polanski's steady hand, and wonderful performances from Jack Nicholson and Faye Dunaway.
